Service Details: - Promotes the well-being, understanding and success of families in business - Provides support, knowledge and resources to those involved in family enterprise including both extended business families and the advisers that counsel them, through participation in peer groups, seminars and conferences- Provides a confidential forum for families and their advisers to share ideas, learn best practices and build their collective skills
